components.label: Content
components.content: Declaration:- By listing or updating my mobile number, I authorize Lawe to email/call/send SMS text messages using an automatic telephone dialing system or prerecorded message to my cell phone number to provide information and services related to legal enquiries. Additionally, I authorize Lawe to follow up in order to remind me of upcoming appointments or provide messages that assist me with my legal practice.
